attributes.action: Make the park area at the look out center Bracknell free again
attributes.additional_details: It's an area I grew up playing in and was free when I was a kid and should be free for further generations
attributes.background: Step in and sort out Bracknell forest council and make the look out play area free to play in

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council. You can find out more about how to contact and petition Bracknell Forest Council here: https://www.bracknell-forest.gov.uk/

We only reject petitions that don’t meet the petition standards.
